titleStmt.title: Generall Lessley's direction and order for the exercising of horse and foot. Being a most exact, compendeous, and necessary direction for all such as are studiously devoted to the due exercise of armes, and principally intended for the young sort of the militia.
titleStmt.author: Newark, David Leslie, Baron, d. 1682.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Richard Badger, for L. Blaikelock,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
